title: "Judas" S9E06 Drew Blood’s Dark Tales (Scary Stories Podcast)
description:
TODAY'S EPISODE OF DREW BLOOD'S DARK TALES IS PROUDLY SPONSORED BY: Factor! Get 50% off plus free shipping on your first box at https://www.factormeals.com/drew50off

On this week’s Drew Blood’s Dark Tales, step beyond the veil of the ordinary and into a world where secrets fester in the dark, and what waits in the shadows may not be what it seems. From author J.G. Martin comes a chilling blend of cosmic dread and human fragility—a tale that asks what price we pay when monsters aren’t the ones we should fear. Settle in, friend… tonight’s story may just change the way you look at good, evil, and everything in between.

▬ LISTEN TO THIS EPISODE AD-FREE IN OUR PATRONS AREA ▬
🗝️ https://www.chillingtalesfordarknights.com/patrons-area/drew-blood-podcast/s9e06-judas/
